direction.description: Optional. The direction of the individual images inside the generated sprite.

dpi.description: Optional. The image resolution of the generated image sprite

format.description: Optional. Output format of the generated image sprite.

images.description: An array of file paths relative to this document.

optimize.description: Optional. Optimizes the generated image either lossy or lossless. Requires the "Image Optimizer" extension for Visual Studio

padding.description: Optional. The padding arround each individual image in the sprite. The value is in pixels.

stylesheets.description: Optional. Define stylesheets (css, less, sass) to be generated as part of the sprite generation process.

formats.description: Specifies which stylesheet types to generate.

root.description: Optional. Add any path root in front of the generated. Example: "/images/"
